item.title: Set_all_Java_apps_to_use_GTK+_font_&_theme_settings
item.description: Introduction This fix makes your Java apps use your GTK+ theme (colours & such) & your chosen font settings. Here is how it looks like: Java default look Java GTK+ look How do you do it? Set the variable _JAVA_OPTIONS by running this command in a terminal: 1 export _JAVA_OPTIONS="-Dawt.useSystemAAFontSettings=on -Dswing.aatext=true -Dswing.defaultlaf=com.sun.java.swing.plaf.gtk.GTKLookAndFeel -Dswing.crossplatformlaf=com.sun.java.swing.plaf.gtk.GTKLookAndFeel ${_JAVA_OPTIONS}" First test to see if the outcome is what you expect by running your Java app from the same terminal window.
